# The Future of Manual Testing with AI: Transforming QA by 2025

The technology landscape is constantly evolving, redefining how software testing is approached. While automation testing has taken center stage over the past years, manual testing remains an essential pillar for delivering high-quality software. The introduction of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing manual testing processes, reshaping the workflow and effectiveness of Quality Assurance (QA). 

This article dives into how manual testing techniques are advancing, the role of AI in manual testing, and how tools like [Zof AI](https://zof.ai) are paving the way for smarter, more efficient testing solutions.
